sentences.sContent: She ganged up on me with those rough boys.
sentences.sContent_eng: She ganged up on me with those rough boys.
sentences.sCn: 她伙同那些粗野的男孩对付我。

sentences.sContent: I transplanted those flowers to the garden.
sentences.sContent_eng: I transplanted those flowers to the garden.
sentences.sCn: 我把那些花移植到花园里。
